Greetings All,

We would like to introduce our java lucene based command line search tool,=
 Minalyzer Lite. It includes a command line version of Heritrix Crawler as =
MinalyzerCrawler.exe / MinalyzerCrawler.sh. Someone with zero knowledge of =
Java and Heritrix can crawl a site in few minutes. We only require specifyi=
ng the user agent & email address in order.xml and specifying the web site =
to crawl in seeds.txt.

Minalyzer Lite ships with an indexing executable, which can index data fro=
m file system, databases, by crawling web sites or an ARC file (output of H=
eritrix Crawler).

The search executable takes the keywords and index collection name as inpu=
ts and returns the resultset as an XML which can be parsed and displyed by =
calling programs.

Our target is primarily to provide "Site Search" for those web sites, whic=
h are hosted on low cost shared servers and do not have JAVA installed (as =
we are shipping an embedded version of Java and the calling program calls t=
he search using exec / backtick / system commands).

This page explains how site search works - http://www.minalyzer.com/docume=
ntation/minalyzerlite--how-site-search-works
This page explains how the crawler works - http://www.minalyzer.com/docume=
ntation/83

We have created some live examples to demonstrate the search features. Mos=
t of these are running on shared hosting accounts which cost less than 3 US=
D a month.

Php script hosted on Linux server http://demo1.minalyzer.com/minalyzerlite=
/search4.php=20
Perl script hosted on Linux server http://demo1.minalyzer.com/minalyzerlit=
e/perl/search.pl
Aspx .Net running on Windows server http://www.minalyzer.com/mlitedemos/as=
px/samplesearch.aspx

We are using the best available open source full text indexing engine and =
we can index ARC files which are generated directly using the full version =
of Heritrix. We hope this will be a useful tool for the Heritrix community.

Thanks
Saurabh
